column3: PURPOSE (should be a verb phrase to sound right while installing)
is a tool for installing many files from one folder tree. [dots/]
is the graphical server. [dots/xinitrc]
starts the graphical server. [dots/xinitrc]
is a program to hide the mouse when still. [dots/xinitrc]
